detailsData.title: Value for Money
detailsData.content: We offer considerable savings compared to traditional office-based law firms. Our leaner model allows savings to be passed directly to your consultant and therefore you.

detailsData.title: Client Focus
detailsData.content: Our consultants have more time to focus directly on their clients. This approach allows you to develop a much closer working relationship that fits around your demanding personal or professional schedule.

detailsData.title: Service Excellence
detailsData.content: You will deal with the experienced consultant directly. All work done by Nexa is carried out by a lawyer, barrister or CILEx with not less than eight years’ experience.

detailsData.title: Flexibility
detailsData.content: Nexa and its consultants are agile and can quickly adapt. They are ready to act in the most effective way for you or your business.
